summary: Project involves deploying a system with SMS/Gmail enquiry options and needs admin access so the user can make changes.

existing_features.title: Add an admin setup UI that lets a logged-in user view their Principal ID, see whether they are currently an admin, and (when not admin) enter/provide the admin bootstrap secret and trigger the backend initialization so they can gain admin access and then navigate to the admin pages.

new_feature_requests.summary: Grant the user admin role/access so they can make changes (admin/role management).
Implement a secure admin-bootstrap path in the backend so the currently authenticated Internet Identity principal can be promoted to admin using the existing secret-token initialization mechanism.

projectName: Grant the logged-in user admin access to manage site content
